VPR.Q: What is the overall spatial distribution pattern shown in the heatmap?
VPR.A: The heatmap shows a {radial gradient} pattern.

What is the heat value of the cell corresponding to YouTube and Creator Economy in the heatmap?

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.85}.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global minimum heat value is {0.12}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value for label Content on the y-axis?
EVJ.A: The maximum heat value for Content on the y-axis is {0.74}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value for label Creator Economy on the y-axis?

SC.Q: What is the average heat value for label Gaming Platforms on the x-axis?
SC.A: The average heat value for Gaming Platforms on the x-axis is {0.43}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Online News and Engagement or the cell corresponding to YouTube and Monetization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {YouTube} and {Monetization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Gaming Platforms and Advertising or the cell corresponding to Twitter and Content?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Gaming Platforms} and {Advertising} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Facebook and Monetization or the cell corresponding to Online News and Revenue?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Facebook} and {Monetization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Twitter and Monetization or the cell corresponding to Online News and Users?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Twitter} and {Monetization} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.67 to 0.72?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Gaming Platforms, Advertising), (Blogs, Content), (Facebook, Content), (Spotify, Content), (Twitter, Content), (YouTube, Creator Economy)}.
